definition: migrant worker/temporary worker enlisted on a public project

sentences.english: Shortage is both opportunities and challenges.
sentences.chinese: 而“‘民工荒’既是机遇，也是挑战。”

sentences.english: This world of difference continues almost a year in Shenyang labour market of migrant workers.
sentences.chinese: 沈阳农民工市场的冰火两重天已持续了快一年的时间。

sentences.english: Would you help a dirty migrant worker stand up when he falls down?
sentences.chinese: 当一个肮脏的民工摔倒时，你会去扶他站起来吗？

sentences.english: On the journey home, the joy of the farm labourers was beyond description.
sentences.chinese: 还家旅途上，农民工的喜悦心情无法形容。

sentences.english: The holiday officially lasts six days, but many workers take a month off.
sentences.chinese: 法定春节假期为6天，但是很多农民工会放假一个月。

sentences.english: The neo-peasant-worker is a new social stratum which comes into appearance in recent years.
sentences.chinese: 新农民工工人阶层是近年来出现的新型社会阶层。

sentences.english: The form of "the shortage of labors" is the result of all kinds of comprehensive factors.
sentences.chinese: “民工荒”的形成是多种因素综合作用的结果。

sentences.english: Self-employed Behaviors of returning-home migrant workers is of great significance for the construction of new countryside.
sentences.chinese: 返乡农民工创业对于新农村建设意义重大。

sentences.english: At present, the situation of China's ideological and political education of migrant workers is not optimistic.
sentences.chinese: 目前，我国对农民工的思想政治教育形势不容乐观。

sentences.english: There are many related research achievements of the movement of farmer-laborers in academic field.
sentences.chinese: 关于农民工迁移流动问题，学术界有许多相关研究。

sentences.english: A large-scale group of peasant-workers'children produced.
sentences.chinese: 规模庞大的农民工子女群体产生了。

sentences.english: Will China's migrant workers get permanent urban residence in 2010?
sentences.chinese: 2010年中国农民工能否拿到城市户口？

sentences.english: He says that he often enters one of the civilian workers that the bank collects water and drinks.
sentences.chinese: 他说他就是常进银行接水喝的民工之一。

sentences.english: Professor Zhao further suggested migrant workers to join skill trainings.
sentences.chinese: 赵教授进一步建议民工参加技能培训。

sentences.english: You will see migrants’ schools closed.
sentences.chinese: 你会见到民工子弟学校被关。

definition: bitter work/hard toil/(loanword) coolie, unskilled Chinese laborer in colonial times
(PRC) flow of people from the countryside into the cities/rural migrant without definite prospects/drifter
to make a hard living as unskilled laborer
